Texts.Chs: 在失重状态下还有53件事要做
Texts.Eng: 53 More Things to do in Zero Gravity

Texts.Chs: 正如它的标题一样，它包含了53个在零重力中能做的有趣的事情。更有趣的是，其中4个涉及谋杀，2个涉及吸盘和泻药。
Texts.Eng: True to its title, it contains 53 fun things to do in Zero Gravity. Interestingly enough, 4 of them involve murder and 2 involve suction cups and laxatives.
